title: EPAM Systems | SSE | Remote
content:
**Details **: 

Working at mid sized product company. 
Mediocre work, bad team environment, bad pay. So switching is a must, do not want to stay even if they match

Previous Comp : 19 LPA (Fixed)

**Offer : **

Education : Tier 1.5 - ish
Years of Experience: 4.2
Date of the Offer: 1 Nov 2024
Company: EPAM Systems
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Permanent Remote
Salary:30LPA fixed (including employer PF + Gratuity.)
Relocation/Signing Bonus:NA
Stock bonus:NA
Bonus:NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30LPA
Benefits: Standard EPAM benefits.

**Other Details : **
Its a 50% hike from my current. I dont know if I should feel good or bad. I feel as per my YOE its still less. My joining date is a next year in feb so still would try to get a better offer. 

Meanwhile I have no idea about EPAM. Is offer a lowball as per SSE level ?
Any other information/pointers on EPAM systems would be appreciated. I tried negotiating for higher base pay or inclusion of bonus but to no avail, the HM said this is the max they can do.

Thank you.

title: Salesforce | PhonePe | Offer Evaluation
content:
I have an offer. **Please help me decide** whether to accept the new offer or stay at current company. 
YOE: 3.5 years

**Current Company**: PhonePe (Joined recently some months back)
Title/Level: Software Engineer (Flat heirarchy)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 31,00,000 (+ 21,600 employer PF)
Joining Bonus: 4,00,000 INR
Stock bonus: 24,00,000 INR ESOPs over 4 years (increased to 30L as valuation got increased)
Performance Bonus: NA
TC (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 37,21,600 INR (including employer PF and excluding joining bonus)
Comments: Team and work here seems to be good. Buy backs - only 25% of last year's vested can be used in buy back. Not sure of IPO. 
Benefits: Lunch, Health insurance

**Company**: Salesforce 
Team: Service cloud
Title/Level: MTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38,00,000 INR (including employer's PF: 1,68,000 INR)
Joining Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 52,000 USD over 4 years
Performance Bonus: 10% of Salary ( 3,80,000 INR )
TC (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 52,70,000 (including 10% performance bonus and employer PF)
Comments: Not sure of team and work quality. Will be eligible for hike in April 2026.
Benefits: ESPP (get salesforce stock at 15% less from 15% of your salary), Breakfast and Lunch, Wellness reimbursement (of 60k), Health insurance

I'm thinking about Learning opportunities, Work quality, Career growth, WLB, PhonePe's IPO, etc.
